freenet.support.io
Class PersistentBlobTempBucketFactory

java.lang.Object
  freenet.support.io.PersistentBlobTempBucketFactory

public class PersistentBlobTempBucketFactory
extends Object

Simple temporary storage mechanism using a single file (or a small number of files), and storing buckets of precisely the block size only. Buckets may not exceed the block size; the rest of the node should only call us if the bucket is of the correct maximum size, and should fall back to one-file-per-bucket otherwise. Currently we only use one blob file. This means that on FAT and some other filesystems, the node will have to fall back once we reach 2GB of temp files.

Author:
Matthew Toseland (0xE43DA450)
